description: This initiative focuses on enhancing agricultural development through a dedicated seeds department, which aims to ensure the availability of seeds across the national territory. It emphasizes collaboration with local communities, including indigenous groups, to promote sustainable practices without altering seed genetics. The program originated from a national seed initiative and operates through multiple research centers nationwide. Its mission is to standardize seed production and educate communities on sustainable agriculture, while navigating challenges such as budget cuts and the need for infrastructure improvements in the agricultural sector.
name: AGROSAVIA
